name: Tab Elements
description: The tab elements are used for creating tab-like structures in web pages. There are three tab elements, tab-group, tab-select, and tab-content. tab-select and tab-content are grouped together via a tab-group element or their group attribute.

attributes.name: group
attributes.description: All tab-select and tab-content elements without their own group attribute that are children of a tab-group will use the group attribute of said tab-group.

elements.name: tab-select
elements.description: When clicked, the selected attribute is removed from every tab-select and tab-content element in the tab group, and then placed onto every tab-select and tab-content in the tab group whose content attribute matches the content attribute of the clicked tab-select

attributes.name: group
attributes.description: the tab group the tab-select belongs to

attributes.name: content
attributes.description: the content that the tab-select element is linked to
